name: Washing machine
description: Client is a 21-year-old single mother who has recently moved into a rental flat with her 1-year-old child. She is the sole caregiver and breadwinner, currently working full-time while attending part-time evening classes to upgrade her qualifications. Due to her caregiving responsibilities and limited time and resources, access to a washing machine is essential to maintain proper hygiene for her child, manage frequent laundry needs, and support a safe and healthy living environment.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

name: washing machine
description: Senior is staying alone in HDB with outstanding loan arrears. She is married without children, her spouse is currently in nursing home. She has liver cirrhosis, and was recently informed she will need transplant, without which her prognosis will not be favorable. Her current washing machine is not working well (will stop even at 1/2 load), with moldy interior. Home Personal Care service is unable to assist with the laundry without a functioning washing machine. As senior is very sensitive to allergens, she will need a new washing machine (not second hand) capable of holding up to 10kg (need to wash heavy bedsheets and other linens due to her allergies)

name: Wheelchair
description:
Mr Zul lives with his spouse in a 2 room rental flat. Mr Zul has visual impairment and is wheelchair bound. 

The wheelchair that Mr Zul purchased from carousell a few years ago had spoilt, putting him in a safety risk. 

A new wheelchair would help him to regain his mobility in a safe manner, so that his spouse would also be able to wheel him with confidence. 

If there are any leads, feel free to contact me, Sabrina at 82922208. thank u!

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Geylang
contact.name: Sabrina Wong
